English: After the great war, Spain remained neutral. French syndicalists took over the country, and syndicalist influence has become stronger in Aragon. The Carlists blame us for being a weak government and claim that we should return Spain to its former glory. Following this, the CNT also rebelled. It's time to be stronger and show what we are capable of

For the good of the federation.

With the political and economic reforms by the liberal government, they have helped to stabilize the current administration, leading to an economic liberalization. However, there are certain sectors that do not approve of certain measures.
German: With the political and economic reforms by the liberal government, they have helped to stabilize the current administration, leading to an economic liberalization. However, there are certain sectors that do not approve of certain measures.

English: In the face of the working-class population's discontent with the bourgeois government's politics, they rise up in arms against it.
German: In the face of the working-class population's discontent with the bourgeois government's policies, they rise up in arms against it.

English: TO RESTORE ORDER IN THE NAME OF DEMOCRACY!!!
German: TO RESTORE ORDER IN THE NAME OF DEMOCRACY!!!

English: GLORY TO GOD, LONG LIVE AND BLESS THE TSAR!!!

In the face of the power usurpation by the Soviets, we find ourselves in a tight situation within the democratic government of Russia. What should we do? Should we annex and join them, or declare war on them until the end?
German: In the face of the power usurpation by the Soviets, we find ourselves in a tight situation within the democratic government of Russia. What should we do? Should we annex and join them, or declare war on them until the end?

English: Declare war on the communist Soviets.
We will request the democratic government if they want to join us or, on the contrary, want war. LONG LIVE THE SOVIETS.
Upon the Red victory, we will assert our claim to the government and the entire territory as the legitimate and central state. It's time for the Great Soviet Union! HURRAH!!!

It's time to return with greater strength than before, to regain the superpower status that made all nations of the world tremble. We must become the great power we once were in the past. LONG LIVE RUSSIA, GLORY TO GOD, AND BLESS THE GREAT TSAR!!
Claiming what God has given us as our lands.

Despite the significant instability caused by the civil war, which brought us to the brink of collapse and the downfall of democracy, it has been fully restored, and all radical power usurpers have been eliminated.
Restore order in all provinces. LONG LIVE DEMOCRACY.
A regime person has not suggested an offer to make a counter revolution against this false party and get the king back where he belongs
Before the great war we were a great empire but now we are only on the island of Britain that will now change
We emerged victorious from the civil war
We managed to defeat the absolutists and the communists, it's time to decide the future of the nation
The Spanish civil war has started and it is close to our border, what should we do?
Continue with plans to restore the empire
Now that we have become independent, we have to see what to do so that the nation prospers again. Some say that we are Germanic and others Slavic.?

After we restored the imperial authority of the showa, we have to choose the most able faction to rule our country. The Yokuseiha Faction led by Kuhara Fusanosuke, the Kodoha Faction led by Araki Sadao, or the Kakushinha Faction led by Konoe Fumimaro.
The Incident of the 15th of May

Yesterday, the 15th of May of 1936, a group of radical navy officers, that tried to stage a coup d'etat, shot and killed the leader of the Rikken Seiyukai and Prime Minister of the nation, Inukai Tsuyoshi. They claim that they did to avenge the death of Katayama Sen, co-founder of the Japanese Communist Party. After this event, the diet fall into a turmoil. Also there is a deep investigation into radical activities of the Navy in course. The emperor, Hirohito, appoint Suzuki Kisaburo to replace Inukai.

The Peace Preservation Act, was established in 1924 by the Takata regime following the sindycalist uprisings of the 1923. This act was broke down in 1926 by the Constitutional Reform of this year, but with the recent assesination of Inukai, the prime minister arguments that we need to redact again the Act, as the National Security Act. What should we do?
The act is forced, the democracy must prevail
The people and the oposition reject the act
After ten years of political inestability, and our country going to the ruin. The army took the power again, to regain the Japan's glory and create a strong state!

The restorationts officers of the navy, have staged a new coup d'etat this morning. The imperial army took fastly all the country, and when they arrived the imperial palace, the emperor announced his support of the revolution
This is the correct way to establish a strong state
The prince Chichibu will become regent
The emperor by right is Akihito

This goverment is weak, the people don't trust on us. We need a popular figurehead that the masses follow him. After all, an agreement with the emperor maybe isn't so bad, it could be the great priece for defending the democracy.
Let us agree with the emperor
He is out of the line!

Japan is actually a strong and influential country, but the democracy prevents us to properate more and, if we continue like this, Japan will decline into a minor country. So, the only option is to establish a strong dictatorship, by a coup d'etat
